summary:
I am an innovative and highly skilled medical professional with more than 10 years of research and regulatory experience. Dedicated to solve complex problems. 
• Extensive expertise in medical devices (heart valves, delivery systems, critical care) and capability to propose necessary testing to establish the biocompatibility and safety of medical devices and their compliance with national and international standards. 
•Experience in working on Standards Committees, AAMI and FDA Working Groups, and well networked in the quality/regulatory community. 
• Wide knowledge in US and global regulations (e.g., EU, China, Korea and Japan) and in requirements for biocompatibility and safety testing, particularly ISO 10993, EU Medical Device Directives (MDD) and Medical Device Regulations (MDR), 510K, and PMA submissions. 
• Knowledge in Quality System Regulations (FDA, ISO13485, EU Medical Devices Directive...), and related standards.
• Excellent leadership skills with the ability to lead multiple simultaneous projects and achieve goals in a timely and effective manner. 
• Effective communicator with the ability to clearly and concisely articulate ideas, concepts and proposals. 
• Excellent organizational, supervisory and teamwork skills.
•cGMP/GLP/GCP Trained

 Specialties:
•  Certified Lead Auditor
• Successfully authored technical reports, summaries, protocols and SOPs.
• Observed and drawn conclusions regarding testing performed with thorough quantitative analysis. 
 Maintained accurate and complete records, methods, measurement and observations related to assigned projects/evaluations.
• Good problem-solving, organizational, analytical and critical thinking skills.
• Knowledge of 21 CFR, cGMP, GDP, GCP, GLP, ICH, FDA, CAP, CLIA, ISO-10993 and USP guidelines. Proficient in 510K and PMA submissions. Experienced with Good Clinical Practice (GCP) in conduct of clinical studies.
• Assay development: Protein assays, Flow cytometry, lipid binding assays, enzymatic and drug assay development. Luminescence and fluorescence detections, cell based immunoassays.
• Project Management, Technical writing, Content development.
headline: Senior Principal Study Director, Biocompatibility, Toxicology and Regulatory Specialist, Clinical and Preclinical studies at Edwards Lifesciences
